testcase.system-out:
Feature: Display Transactions
AS A: CM App user that has added my accounts I WANT: To be able to view my recent transactions when viewing the account details SO THAT: I can see how my money is spent
@transactions Scenario Outline: Display transactions - current, savings and credit card &amp#27;[90m# features/Transactions.feature:11&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI login with valid credentials&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI tap include my bank button&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI tap "HSBC" bank&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI login with valid credentials&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI am on polling screen&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mAccounts have successfully been added&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI am on you screen&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI select an account of type <Account>&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mI select a month with some transactions&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[36mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[36mthe merchant name and amount per transaction should be displayed&amp#27;[0m
